backend/main.mo: Defines core types for books, meditation data, journal entries, progress tracking, user profiles, rituals, and initial book list within the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI layout change to the affected frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for many frontend files, describing their purpose and recent updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook providing step‑by‑step instructions for redeploying the app without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template and checklist for diagnosing and resolving deployment failures across build and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and light/dark color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document with error‑handling shims and script bootstrapping for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider, error boundary, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel UI for selecting ambient sounds with swipe navigation, audio preview, mute, and volume controls.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a detailed fallback UI with message, stack, component stack, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Error banner that displays cloud sync issues with context‑specific messages and a retry button with loading states.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Duration slider input that manually adjusts thumb position and lets users pick a duration within a min/max range.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with animated icons that navigate to app sections and show labels on hover.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide‑out menu providing theme switching, account status, login/logout actions, and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Dropdown UI for filtering journal entries by favorites, moods, energy, dates, and text with clear‑all support.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated book-like viewer supporting swipe, keyboard navigation, and smooth scrolling between pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel for knowledge categories with keyboard, swipe, and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Modal quiz flow handling shuffled questions, navigation, scoring, and results display.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on a growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system orbiting or moving chaotically around the lotus depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas animation rendering lotus petals and particles with theme- and variant-based visibility effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel for meditation types with swipe navigation and animated center-focused card layout.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-based meditation guide with swipe navigation and parsed content including optional benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular meditation timer with animated wave fill, glow effects, and theme-based colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas wave-based circular fill indicator that smoothly interpolates progress and animates layered water waves.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard and supports a custom callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper that renders a LotusCanvas background and displays children on top.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered glowing bowl that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus visualization using React Three Fiber with growth state, lighting, particles, and auto-rotation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG animated lotus whose petals, glow, and breathing motion evolve based on growth state, streaks, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step dialog quiz that records answers, computes a recommended meditation type, and returns the result.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal displaying up to five saved rituals, letting users start or delete one, with an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting rituals with swipe navigation and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows guest or logged‑in status and provides navigation and logout actions while clearing cached queries.
Provides navigation controls including theme toggle, back button, session indicator, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Provides a retry‑aware wrapper for running cloud write operations using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for creating, loading, and managing an Internet Identity AuthClient, including login state and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a configurable meditation timer hook with pause, start, reset, seeking, duration adjustments, and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating books, quotes, profiles, journal entries, and guest-mode storage with actor and identity integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables, plus animation utilities for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines structured meditation technique content including pages and quizzes for the knowledge section.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays book recommendations with swipeable navigation and dynamic card positioning; handles theme, touch gestures, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows daily quote, meditation selector, rituals, and navigation; manages quiz dialog, ritual modal, and routing to meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages viewing, filtering, editing, favoriting, importing, and exporting journal entries with authentication-aware behavior.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Renders meditation knowledge categories, guides, and quizzes; syncs category with URL, loads user quiz scores, and supports deep-linked scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with theme toggle and animated layout, handling login, guest mode, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page for configuring meditation sessions with mood/energy inputs, ambient sounds, timers, and detailed guides.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user meditation progress, ranks, stats, and supports cloud import/export with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a reflection feature page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an app statistics page.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to fetch sounds and audio paths.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud-sync error types and logic to map backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations, detecting authorization and readiness errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Serializes and validates meditation-related data for JSON export/import with safe bigint handling.
Manages knowledge quiz scores using localStorage with identity-aware keys and a helper hook.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth state over 0–20k minutes, mapping phases and smooth curves to visual parameters for petals, layers, and particles.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only meditation data in localStorage, including journals, progress, and legacy key migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, mapping aliases to supported enum values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers by total minutes and provides helpers to get current/next ranks and display formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, and active feature requests for layout and UI fixes.
